---
title: ".kodiak.toml"
---

## High-level description
This code defines the configuration for Kodiak, a GitHub bot that automates pull request approvals, updates, and merges. The configuration specifies automatic approvals for Dependabot PRs, enables automatic updates for all other PRs, and sets the merge method to "squash".

## Configuration
This file defines configuration options for the Kodiak bot.

| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| `approve.auto_approve_usernames` | list | - | A list of usernames whose pull requests should be automatically approved. |
| `update.always` | boolean | - | Whether Kodiak should always attempt to update pull requests by merging the base branch. |
| `update.ignored_usernames` | list | - | A list of usernames whose pull requests should not be automatically updated. |
| `merge.method` | string | - | The merge method to use when merging pull requests. Possible values are "merge", "squash", and "rebase". |
